revised_title: William George Fearnsides: A Pioneering Geologist and Academic
tldr: The article is a biographical memoir of William George Fearnsides, a renowned geologist and academic who made significant contributions to the understanding of Lower Palaeozoic rocks, particularly in Wales and Scandinavia. Fearnsides' work on the Cambro-Ordovician boundary and his influential geological mapping of the Arenig district in North Wales remain the standard descriptions of the type area and provide a firm basis for correlation in Britain and overseas.
